function onStepIn(cid, item, position, fromPosition) if(isPlayer(cid) ~= true or getPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage) == config.version) then return end
for _, m in pairs(config.marks) do f_addMark(cid, m.pos, m.mark, m.desc ~= nil and m.desc or "") end
setPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage, config.version) return true end

function onStepOut(cid, item, position, fromPosition) if(item.uid == 32193) then doTransformItem(item.uid, 2709) end
return true end
